title: Wealthy County in New York Must Pay $112 Million Over Immigrant Rights Violations
description: New York’s Suffolk County, home to the ultra-wealthy Hamptons and the bucolic North Fork, must pay $112 million in damages to immigrants after a court ruled that their detention in local jails violated their rights. The Long Island county disclosed …
